bug.author: snehpandya123
bug.summary: No Visualization for SchemaGen and ExampleValidator
bug.description:
Changes made to the Input function examples = external_input(_data_root_param) inputpath = example_gen_pb2.Input(splits=[example_gen_pb2.Input.Split(name='train', pattern='train/'),example_gen_pb2.Input.Split(name='eval', pattern='test/')]) example_gen = CsvExampleGen(input=examples) statistics_gen = StatisticsGen(examples=example_gen.outputs['examples']) Schema_gen = SchemaGen( statistics=statistics_gen.outputs['statistics']) example_validator = ExampleValidator( statistics=statistics_gen.outputs['statistics'], schema=schema_gen.outputs['schema']) <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5006534/93480510-84e6f700-f8cb-11ea-89b8-64ba4765d161.png></denchmark-link>
ExampleValidator <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5006534/93480718-bf509400-f8cb-11ea-8820-932b295b26b6.png></denchmark-link>
I am able to see the anomalies are avaialble in /train and /eval folder Versions: tensorflow : 2.3.0 tfx: 0.23.0 GCP Kubeflow :1.0.0

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/snehpandya123>@snehpandya123</denchmark-link> As the error message suggests, the specified path is not found. Can you try reproducing this is google colab and see if the issue is reproducible? Thanks!
for anomalies/3990/ I have train & eval folder instead of anomalies.pbtxt

Also I update TFX version to 0.23.0 and reran the code lab <denchmark-link:https://colab.research.google.com/github/tensorflow/tfx/blob/master/docs/tutorials/tfx/components.ipynb#scrollTo=TDyAAozQcrk3>https://colab.research.google.com/github/tensorflow/tfx/blob/master/docs/tutorials/tfx/components.ipynb#scrollTo=TDyAAozQcrk3</denchmark-link>
and got same error.

itâ€˜s the same issue as <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tfx/issues/2582>this</denchmark-link>
0.24 is released yesterday, could you try 0.24?
